content: through the remaining stitches to round 90 105 120 sts rem secure them round 2 * k1 star 3 times k1 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 84 98 112 sts rem finishing round 3 *k12 k2tog repeat from * to the weave in tails block hat if desired end of the round 78 91 104 sts rem 3 | fireworks hat ©2020 shaina bilow designs thank you for choosing this pattern please post photos of your finished hats to ravelry and social media www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs
